main event: A radar operator observed a radar blip which moved erratically at high speeds.
interesting points: The radar blip was observed to move rapidly at speeds between 3000-5000 mph., The blip was orange in color when seen on the scope., The size indication suggested it was approximately 30-40 feet in diameter., The observation lasted for 1 minute before the blip faded from the radar., Another report details a sighting of a red ball of fire with horizontal streamers while flying at 2500 feet.
